tacobell-freeitem.title: Buy 1 Get 1 Free — Any Crispy or Soft Taco
tacobell-freeitem.description: Buy one Taco, get one of equal or lesser value free. One redemption per customer.
tacobell-freeitem.fine_print: At participating locations. Not valid with other offers.

popeyes-2pc.title: Buy 1 Get 1 Free — 2pc Meal
popeyes-2pc.description: Buy One 2pc Meal get One Free. One redemption per customer.
popeyes-2pc.fine_print: Valid at participating locations. Not combinable.

mcd-bogo.title: Buy 1 Get 1 Free — Any Sandwich Combo
mcd-bogo.description: Buy one Sandwich Combo, get one of equal or lesser value free. One redemption per customer.
mcd-bogo.fine_print: Not valid with any other offers. Valid only at participating McDonald's.

bk-bogo-whopper.title: Buy 1 Get 1 Free - Whopper®
bk-bogo-whopper.description: Buy one Whopper®, get one of equal or lesser value free.

wendys-free-side.title: Free Side with Any Entrée
wendys-free-side.description: Get a free side with any entrée purchase.
wendys-free-side.fine_print: One redemption per customer. Not redeemable for cash.

kfc-bucket-10.title: $10 Off Family Bucket
kfc-bucket-10.description: Get $10 off any Family Bucket. One redemption per customer.

pizzahut-large-5.title: $5 Off Any Large Pizza
pizzahut-large-5.description: Take $5 off any large pizza. One redemption per customer.
pizzahut-large-5.fine_print: Must present coupon at time of order.

chipotle-bogo-bowl.title: Buy 1 Get 1 Free - Burrito Bowl
chipotle-bogo-bowl.description: Buy one Burrito Bowl, get one free of equal or lesser value.

subway-free-sub.title: Buy 1 Get 1 Free - Footlong Sub
subway-free-sub.description: Enjoy a free Footlong Sub with any Footlong purchase of equal or lesser value.
subway-free-sub.fine_print: One per customer. While supplies last.

whataburger-bogo.title: BOGO Whataburger®
whataburger-bogo.description: Buy one Whataburger®, get one free of equal or lesser value.

sonic-bogo-coney.title: Buy 1 Coney Combo, Get 1 Free
sonic-bogo-coney.description: Double up on Coney combos—pay for one, get one free.
sonic-bogo-coney.fine_print: Valid at participating Sonic Drive-In locations.

dq-finger-basket.title: Buy 1 Get one Free - Basket Combo
dq-finger-basket.description: Buy one Steak or Chicken Finger Basket Combo, Get one of Free.
dq-finger-basket.fine_print: At participating DQ® stores. Not valid with other offers.
